content: these 6 inch spring bunnies are perfect for your easter decor or work up quick to make as gifts also working from the bottom to top these spring bunnies are made in one piece besides adding in addition ear materials needed any worsted weight yarn or be creative and make in other weights for a variety of spring bunnies polyfil for stuffing extra black strand of yarn for eyes and nose or use small black beads facebook page https //www facebook com/ollieloops use hashtag #ollieloopsspringbunnies on social media need help on the ears i created a few photos and quick video to help follow the link to my instgram page https //www instagram com/stories/highlights/17983118092854294/
